plot: A mysterious lady commissions two hoodlums with a matter of urgency. Time is getting short and the way to their car in the basement garage is long. Good chance for a little story.
title: Underground Odyssey
plot_es: A mysterious lady commissions two hoodlums with a matter of urgency. Time is getting short and the way to their car in the basement garage is long. Good chance for a little story.
